commit message: fixed spinner not keeping last choice and added search for subsets as well
Added long click for word definition search function
now results are presented immediately when found (in another thread to avoid ui lag)
added code for creating sorted dictionaries
removed words with <3 letters from dictionaries and changed sorted ones to hash for smaller size
cleaned up code, updated support lib
added sherlockactionbar + storageutils for compatibility of up to android 2.2
added option to stop search when it's taking too long
added auto keyboard hide when search begins
added german language, major code clean up
added spanish and italian and reduced dictionary size a bit
add tablet layout changes and change all lang strings to normalized form
fix loading of dictionaries on each app start, update apk
added settings page, added keepscreen on and sort settings, switched dictionaries to words not hashes, improved search speed and cleaned up code a bit
